subject: Your long awaited part payment
body:
Your long awaited part payment of $I5,500,000.00 USD (FIFTEEN MILLION FIVE Hundred Thousand United State Dollars) is ready for immediate release to you, and it was electronically credited into an ATM Visa Card for easy delivery. EMAIL: REPLY TO:

subject: Re: Your long awaited part payment
body:
Hello George,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm glad to hear that my part payment of USD FIFTEEN MILLION FIVE Hundred Thousand United State Dollars is ready for release. That's quite a significant amount!

I would appreciate it if you could provide me with more details about the process of receiving this payment. How does the ATM Visa Card delivery work? Are there any fees or charges associated with it? Also, could you please clarify what my new Payment Reference No. is?

I look forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Irma

subject: Re: Your long awaited part payment
body:

Could you please explain why you need my full name, address, age, and passport or driver's license? What is the purpose of this processing unit and how does it relate to ATM services?

subject: Re: Your long awaited part payment
body:
Dear George ATM Philippine processing Unit,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your prompt response. Before I proceed, could you please provide me with more information about the purpose of this request? What exactly do you need my full name, address, age, and passport or driver's license for?
